message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. Given its value to you, I believe we can reach a fair agreement. I propose to sell the product to you for $14000. This price reflects its high quality and the significant benefit it will bring to you. I look forward to your response.

I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12000. This is the product's value to you, and I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm looking to save some money, but I'm still interested in purchasing the product.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your position and respect your valuation of the product. In light of this, I would like to propose an alternative. How about we aim for a price closer to $13000? This still allows us to share the value of the product while accommodating your budget constraints. I hope this suggestion resonates with you, and I look forward to your feedback.

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice, but I'm still a bit away from the price I'm comfortable with. I'm willing to meet you in the middle, so I'll counteroffer at $12500. I believe this is a fair price for both of us, and I'm eager to finalize the purchase.
